attributes.action: THE REINSTATEMENT OF THE PLAY AREA TO THE REAR OF DAWSON ROAD BARNARD CASTLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to get the playarea put back were it use to be. the council pulled it out some years ago. now there is nothing and dogs are fouling the area. the children are playing in the streets due to a lack of a safe clean playing area due to lack of facility's

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
